description:
Configuration for a workspace in the Flow CLI.
This configuration is used to define the settings for a workspace.
Every workspace has a workspace config file named `flow.yaml` in the root of the workspace directory.

CommonTags.description:
A list of tags.
Tags can be used with list commands to filter returned data.

excluded.description: A list of directories to exclude from the executable search.

included.description: A list of directories to include in the executable search.

description.description: A description of the workspace. This description is rendered as markdown in the interactive UI.

descriptionFile.description: A path to a markdown file that contains the description of the workspace.

displayName.description: The display name of the workspace. This is used in the interactive UI.
